# Required

Questions 1.19, 1.21 (2nd Edition) or 1.8, 1.9 (1st Edition)

# Recommended

Question 1.23 (2nd Edition) or 1.10 (1st Edition)

[Note: these questions will expect that you will have fit the regression model before characterizing the residuals]

# Template `.RMd` file

There is a template RMarkdown file for thiese questions [here.](http://sds291.netlify.com/HW/SDS291_HW1_Template.Rmd) The link will download the `.RMd` template file, which you can upload to the server as we did in class or open in the desktop version of RStudio.

# Submit on Moodle

Use the Homework 1 submission on Moodle for [section 1](https://moodle.smith.edu/course/view.php?id=36873) or [section 2](https://moodle.smith.edu/course/view.php?id=36874). If your registration is still in process and you don't yet have Moodle access, you can submit it via email.
